Posts.Content: Hi jacru1950, I stopped taking my armidex after taking if for five years April 21st of 2016, so almost one year ago. I would say it took at least six months for my joints to feel better.  I suffer from a very bad knee, so bad, I'm getting a total right knee replacement on May 4th.  My thighs still bother me, mostly though it's better than it was while taking Armidex. The biggest improvement has been not being so stiff, and being able to walk right away after sitting down. Also, I can button buttons better now too. Hope you feel better very soon, God Bless.  Judy
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: I wouldn't take it fir another five years either! I barely gkt tbru five years of that nasty drug! I'm hopeful in the future they will find a drug that isn't so hard to live on, maybe someday they will.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: I have thyroid nodules now too, never had it before the armidex. Had the larest ine biopsied, negative foe cancer. I exercised regularly so only gained seven lbs. my nails and teeth are chipping away.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Hi, I just got off of armidex after five long years, I started to gain weight from taking it too. I started taking organic freeze-dried acai berry capsules, two a day after every meal. I only have gained three lbs in the five years. Hope this helps you! Hugs, Judy
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Hi ladies, I was diagnosed with stage 1b no mo bc On Dec 15th, 2010. I had 3 1/2 weeks of rads and a lumpectomy in my right breast. my onc put ne on anastrozole and I thought I had died and gone to Hell. I tried to get the name brand drug Armidex thru my insurance, but that was a big fat no. My onc then told me that I could buy it from Eagle Pharmacy for 30.00 a month. So if you would rather be in the brand name, here is the info. Your onc has to fax them a prescription. Eagle pharmacy 500 eagles landing dr, suite c Lakeland, Florida 33810 Phone: 855 748-2663
